abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column describes how counterfeiting cottage industry sprang up on New Year's Eve revolving around LOL Times Square Comedy Club in Times Square in Manhattan; notes many unsuspecting visitors bought fraudulent tickets for club based on promises they would be able to see ball drop from club's tables, but bar and theater has no windows.
lead_paragraph: After buying counterfeit tickets to a Times Square comedy club, some who thought their ball-drop vantage point was secure were left out in the cold.

headline.main: Sold on a View, New Year’s Revelers Fall to a Forgery Scheme
headline.print_headline: Sold on a View, New Year’s Revelers Are Ensnared in a Forgery Scheme

snippet: After buying counterfeit tickets to a Times Square comedy club, some who thought their ball-drop vantage point was secure were left out in the cold.
